item.title: Compiler Tricks - Inferred Types
item.description: The .NET compiler is a terrific thing… After all, it turns your C# into an executable program! One nice feature of the .NET compiler, which is becoming better each release, is inferred typing. I’d like to lay out a few short examples that might help you develop your programming standards and practices.
